title: Open Borders
description:
This week, economist and professional contrarian Bryan Caplan joins Slate Money to discuss his books on parenting, education, and, his latest, a graphic novel called Open Borders: The Science and Ethics of Immigration.  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
